surgerydetails.line1: Home visits by arrangement.
Home visits can be arranged with Councillor Jordan by telephone or email.

Councillor Letts holds a surgery on the first Tuesday of the month, between 10 and 12noon, at Hinkler Place Community Centre. Councillor Letts is happy to visit you in your own home by arrangement. To make an appointment, please phone or email Councillor Letts using the details given on this page.
Councillors share surgeries at Cobbett Road Library on the third Saturday of the month from 10.30 am to 12.30 pm (except August and December)
Councillors share surgeries at Cobbett Road Library on the third Saturday of the month, from 10.30am to 12.30pm (except August and December).
Councillors share surgeries at Cobbett Road Libarary on the third Saturday of the month, from 10.30am to 12.30pm (except August and December). Home visits by appointment.

surgerydetails.line1: Councillor Thomas holds a surgery on the first Saturday of each month at Lordshill Library from 10.30am to 12noon and on the fourth Saturday of each month at Coxford Community Centre from 10.30am to 12noon. Please phone 8032 0584 for an appointment at the Lordshill Library. Home visits by arrangement- please phone 8032 0584.
Councillors Moulton and Parnell share surgeries, times and venues are advertised locally.
